explains: n. （男子的）成年，成年期；男子气概；<文>一国的男子；<文>阴茎；<古>人性

sentences.en: Her new-found power was a threat to his manhood.
sentences.cn: 她最近具有的能力对他的男子汉气概是个威胁。

sentences.en: The nation's manhood died on the battlefields of World War I.
sentences.cn: 这个国家的男子都在第一次世界大战的战场上牺牲了。

sentences.en: His handwriting, from earliest young manhood, was flowing and graceful.
sentences.cn: 从他刚刚成年时起，他的书法就流畅而优美。
